entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 25 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 25 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
